qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the judgment of Hamilton, Harrison, Court and Vandalia, Bayside, Court, what are the occupations of the defendants M. Ward and G. Torres?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the judgment of Hamilton, Harrison, Court, the defendant M. Ward is a nurse. According to the judgment of Vandalia, Bayside, Court, the defendant G. Torres is an elementary school teacher.
